tool_description: Calculates life stage specific caloric adjustments for growth, reproduction, and aging metabolic changes.

growth_stage.description: Growth phase for young animals (rapid, moderate, slow)

error_messages: Species not supported: Provide valid species for life stage analysis
Invalid age: Age must be positive number
Invalid reproductive status: Use one of [intact, neutered, pregnant, lactating]
Invalid growth stage: Use one of [rapid, moderate, slow, none]
usage: Input species, age_years, and reproductive_status. For young animals, specify growth_stage for accurate caloric adjustments.

caloric_adjustment_factor.description: Multiplier for life stage energy needs

special_considerations.description: List of special nutritional considerations for this life stage
